property.name: displayVariant
property.label: Display Option
property.description: Select the default format of the card. Options are: None (flat) or Featured (drop shadow), Outline (flat with border).

property.name: titleTextSingular
property.label: Title Text Singular
property.description: Title text to display when there is only one record.

property.name: titleTextPlural
property.label: Title Text Plural
property.description: Title text to display when there is more than one record or zero records.

property.name: showIcon
property.label: Show Icon
property.description: Enable to display an icon in the header.

property.name: iconName
property.label: Icon Name
property.description: Enter the name of the SLDS Icon to display.

property.name: displaySearch
property.label: Show Search
property.description: Enable the search tool in the banner.

property.name: searchPlaceHolder
property.label: Search Placeholder Text
property.description: Placeholder text for search field. If empty, no text will display.

property.name: searchTitle
property.label: Search Title
property.description: Search for files and folders by title.

property.name: searchDescription
property.label: Search Description
property.description: Search for files and folders by description.

property.name: searchContent
property.label: Search Content
property.description: Search for files by content. Note: This may affect system performance.

property.name: showBottomBorder
property.label: Show Bottom Border
property.description: Display a border line below the header.

property.name: listId
property.label: List Id
property.description: Unique ID for the list results. Allows multiple list components to exist on a page. This property relates this component to a specific list.
